section.p: This template represents the type of referral (e.g., for dental care, to a specialist, for aging problems) and represents whether the referral is for full care or shared care. It may contain a reference to another act in the document instance representing the clinical reason for the referral (e.g., problem, concern, procedure).

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-30886, CONF:1098-30887 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.140"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PCPR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-30884)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Patient Referral Act moodCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.66 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1098-30885)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-30888)
In the case of a Consultation Note where this referral is being fulfilled by this consultation, this id would be referenced in the inFullfilmentOf/order/id of the Consultation Note.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Referral Types 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.56 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-30889)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-30892)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31598)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-30893)
The effectiveTime represents the time when the future referral is intended to take place.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode (CONF:1098-32623)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31612)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31604)
The following entryRelationship represents whether the referral is for full or shared care.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:1098-31613)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation such that it (CONF:1098-31605)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-31606)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="RQO" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-31607)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-31608)/@code="ASSERTION" assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-31619, CONF:1098-31620)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31614)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31615)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32443)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Care Model 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.61 STATIC 2014-06-19 (CONF:1098-31611)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31635, CONF:1098-31636, CONF:1098-32634)
The following entryRelationship represents a reference to another act in the document instance representing the clinical reason for the referral (e.g., problem, concern, procedure).
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1098-32635)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFT" (CONF:1098-32638)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-32636)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32637)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="PCPR" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-30884)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Patient Referral Act moodCode 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.66 STATIC 2014-09-01 (CONF:1098-30885)

SHALL contain at least one [1..*] id (CONF:1098-30888)
In the case of a Consultation Note where this referral is being fulfilled by this consultation, this id would be referenced in the inFullfilmentOf/order/id of the Consultation Note.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code, which SHALL be selected from ValueSet Referral Types 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.56 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-30889)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-30892)/@code="active" Active (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31598)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime (CONF:1098-30893)
The effectiveTime represents the time when the future referral is intended to take place.
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode (CONF:1098-32623)

SHOULD contain [0..*] author such that it (CONF:1098-31612)
Conforms to Author Participation (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119)

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31604)
The following entryRelationship represents whether the referral is for full or shared care.
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="SUBJ" (CONF:1098-31613)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] observation such that it (CONF:1098-31605)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @classCode="OBS" Observation (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.6 HL7ActClass) (CONF:1098-31606)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="RQO" (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood) (CONF:1098-31607)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-31608)/@code="ASSERTION" assertion (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.4 HL7ActCode) (CONF:1098-31619, CONF:1098-31620)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] statusCode (CONF:1098-31614)/@code="completed" Completed (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.14 ActStatus) (CONF:1098-31615)
SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] priorityCode, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Act Priority 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.16866 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32443)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with @xsi:type="CD", which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Care Model 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.61 STATIC 2014-06-19 (CONF:1098-31611)

MAY contain [0..*] entryRelationship such that it (CONF:1098-31635, CONF:1098-31636, CONF:1098-32634)
Contains @typeCode="RSON" RSON
Conforms to Indication2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19:2014-06-09)
The following entryRelationship represents a reference to another act in the document instance representing the clinical reason for the referral (e.g., problem, concern, procedure).

MAY contain zero or more [0..*] participant such that it (CONF:1098-32635)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @typeCode="REFT" (CONF:1098-32638)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] participantRole such that it (CONF:1098-32636)
MAY contain zero or one [0..1] code, which SHOULD be selected from ValueSet Healthcare Provider Taxonomy (HIPAA) 2.16.840.1.114222.4.11.1066 DYNAMIC (CONF:1098-32637)

body.codeblock: <act xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" classCode="PCPR"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.140"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.140"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="349827583"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="active"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <priorityCode code="996226449"/> <author> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.119"/> <time/> <assignedAuthor> <id root="MDHT" extension="874463884"/> <code code="81640416"/> <assignedPerson/> <representedOrganization/> </assignedAuthor> </author> <participant typeCode="REFT"> <participantRole> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.101" codeSystemName="NUCC Health Care Provider Taxonomy"/> </participantRole> </participant> <entryRelationship typeCode="SUBJ"> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="RQO"> <code code="ASSERTION" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.4" codeSystemName="HL7ActCode" displayName="assertion"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <priorityCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.5.7" codeSystemName="ActPriority"/> <value xsi:type="CD" code="535366517"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> <entryRelationship> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19" extension="2014-06-09"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.19"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="439522306"/> <code codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.96" codeSystemName="SNOMEDCT"/> <text>Text Value</text> <statusCode code="completed"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2017"/> <high value="2017"/> </effectiveTime> <priorityCode code="2084362678"/> </observation> </entryRelationship> </act>
